    • Method Detail

      • getUserCommand

        public java.lang.String getUserCommand()
        Prompts for the command and reads the text entered by the user. Ignores empty, pure whitespace, and comment lines. Echos the command back to the user.
        Returns:
        command (full line) entered by the user

      • showWelcomeMessage

        public void showWelcomeMessage()
        Generates and prints the welcome message upon the start of the application.

      • showGoodbyeMessage

      • showInitFailedMessage

        public void showInitFailedMessage()

      • showResultToUser

        public void showResultToUser​(CommandResult result)
        Shows the result of a command execution to the user. Includes additional formatting to demarcate different command execution segments.
